title: Practitioner-Centered Open Language Project Development Process

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Practical Work Experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening the capacity to develop practical language projects in digitally supported environments.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize open educational resources (OER) at least three times within the project cycle (planning-development-evaluation).
Learners can produce and present one or more practical deliverables by applying PBL (Project-Based Learning) to language projects.
Learners can improve project outcomes by over 80% using evaluation tools that incorporate peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
